description.value: Code system of concepts specifying the final status of the claim. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the GP1 segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0457 (Overall Claim Disposition Code)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Only edits present are for line item denial or rejection

definition.value: Only edits present are for line item denial or rejection

display.value: Multiple-day claim with one or more days denied or rejected

definition.value: Multiple-day claim with one or more days denied or rejected

display.value: Claim denied, rejected, suspended or returned to provider with only post payment edits

definition.value: Claim denied, rejected, suspended or returned to provider with only post payment edits

display.value: Claim denied, rejected, suspended or returned to provider with only pre payment edits

definition.value: Claim denied, rejected, suspended or returned to provider with only pre payment edits
